title: Crime Alert 04.29.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.29.19
description:
Trial underway for former school principal accused of killing her husband. 40 year old cold case solved by DNA from a razor. Georgia parents make plea for help in finding daughter.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
